# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to provide exceptional value. Given its quality and features, we believe it's worth more than $150. Considering the high standards and benefits this product offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at $200. This is a limited-time opportunity, so please let me know if you're interested in securing this deal. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
